sentences.en: At times, Congress moves quickly and explicitly to reverse or postpone a controversial agency action.
sentences.cn: 有时, 国会迅速明确地采取行动取消或延缓有争议的机关行动.

sentences.en: Bush explicitly acknowledged that humans were contributing to global warming.
sentences.cn: 布什明确的承认每个人都在对全球变暖做“贡献”.

sentences.en: I would only belong to an environmental movement if it was explicitly non-violent.
sentences.cn: 我只会投身明确宣称采用非暴力手段的环境保护运动。

sentences.en: If they did not call themselves romanticists they nevertheless disagreed explicitly with Howells and his proteges.
sentences.cn: 他们即使不曾以浪漫派自称,也明目张胆反对豪威尔斯和他的门徒.

sentences.en: In a nonautonomous system, f is explicitly a function of t.
sentences.cn: 在非自主的系统中, f是t的显函数.

sentences.en: It eliminates the need to specify recursion explicitly.
sentences.cn: 它消除了明确地指定递归的需求。

sentences.en: It is necessary to explicitly introduce chemical kinetic limitations into the envelope flame model.
sentences.cn: 显然必须把化学动力学限制引入外边层火焰模型.

sentences.en: Likewise, you cannot explicitly a partition from a local index.
sentences.cn: 同样, 用户也不能显示地移除本地分区索引中的分区.

sentences.en: Maxwell's field equations described this measurable disturbance of the medium without explicitly discussing the ether itself.
sentences.cn: 麦克斯韦电磁场方程描写了媒质的这种可测量的扰动,而不去详细讨论以太本身.

sentences.en: Only number of the stories thus designated explicitly refer to fairies.
sentences.cn: 只有少部分的童话明确提到了仙子和精灵.

sentences.en: Procedures using input: enter explicitly, enter the 8 - bit key.
sentences.cn: 程序使用输入: 输入明文, 输入8位密钥.

sentences.en: Program explicitly set forth a three - year development goals of traditional industries.
sentences.cn: 规划纲要明确提出了传统产业三年发展目标.

sentences.en: SARA amended section 113 to provide explicitly for a right to contribution.
sentences.cn: 《最高基金修正与再授权法案》修正了第123条,清楚地规定了分配权.

sentences.en: She has been talking very explicitly about AIDS to these groups.
sentences.cn: 她一直都在非常坦诚地和这些群体谈论艾滋病问题。

sentences.en: She was explicitly forbidden to attend.
sentences.cn: 清楚表明不准她参加.

sentences.en: Tell them explicitly you want to continue the friendship.
sentences.cn: 明确地告诉他们你想继续这段友谊。

sentences.en: The difference between an ordinary and a partial derivative was at first not explicitly recongized.
sentences.cn: 通常的导数与偏导数的区别在一开始并未被人们明确地认识.

sentences.en: Therefore, you need to include these in your source files explicitly.
sentences.cn: 因此，您需要将这些都明确地包含进源文件中。

sentences.en: Without a parent style, your action bar will be without many style properties unless you explicitly declare them yourself.
sentences.cn: 如果没有父母样式化，你的操作栏将不很多样式属性，除非你明确自己声明它们。

sentences.en: You have to grant us control explicitly.
sentences.cn: 你们必须允许我们明确地控制。

words.tran_cn: 明确的；清楚的；直率的；详述的
